shortdesc.ph: Describes detailed information about a music resource.
Represents detailed information about a music resource.

plentry.pd: The ID of the music resource, used to identify a music entry.
The name of the music resource.
The name of the singer.
Download link for the music poster.
The release time of the music resource.
Total duration of the music resource (in seconds).

Type of the music resource:
1: Single track, left channel is accompaniment, right channel is original vocals.
2: Single track, accompaniment only.
3: Single track, original vocals only.
4: Multi-track audio.

Whether the song supports pitch scoring:
1: Supports pitch scoring.
2: Does not support pitch scoring.
The number of available lyrics for the song.

Supported lyric formats:
0: XML format.
1: LRC format.
The number of climax segments.
List of climax segments. See .
Number of MVs. If this value is greater than 0, it indicates that the current music has MV resources.
List of MV properties.
The unique identifier of the music resource, used to identify a specific music resource.
The name of the music resource.
The name of the singer.
The download URL of the music resource poster.
The release time of the music resource.

The type of the music resource:
1: Single-track audio, left channel is accompaniment, right channel is original vocal.
2: Single-track audio, accompaniment only.
3: Single-track audio, original vocal only.
4: Multi-track audio.

Whether the song supports scoring:
1: Supports scoring.
2: Does not support scoring.
The total duration of the music resource (in seconds).

Supported lyric types:
0: XML format.
1: LRC format.
List of MV properties, representing MV information contained in the music resource.
List of music climax segments. See .
